promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young simple serpent water-type pokemon with a ornate tail. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquatail, a a young simple serpent water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Sleepy Ball, Ditch and Splash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "water" or "Aquatail". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, serpent-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, gleaming bubble background
generatedDescription: Subtle as sea mist, this youthful creature dances beneath the tides. Known for its Sleepy Ball ability, it tends to retreat with Ditch, then resumes play with a Splash.
